rpminfo_test.comment: Ensure package name matching '^(?i)pgbackrest.*$' is installed

systemdunitdependency_test.comment: Ensure 'default.target' has a dependency of postgres

sql57_test.comment: Ensure the log destinations are set correctly
Ensure the logging collector is enabled
Ensure the log file destination directory is set correctly
Ensure the filename pattern for log files is set correctly
Ensure the log file permissions are set to '0600'
Ensure the maximum log file lifetime is set correctly
Ensure the maximum log file size is set correctly
Ensure the correct syslog facility is selected
Ensure the program name for PostgreSQL syslog messages is correct
Ensure the correct messages are written to the server log
Ensure the correct SQL statements generating errors are recorded
Ensure the PostgreSQL Audit Extension (pgAudit) is enabled
Ensure excessive function privileges are revoked
Ensure the `pg_permissions` extension is available for use.
Ensure the extension 'set_user' is available for use.
Review the list of all database roles that have `superuser` access.
Ensure SSL is enabled and configured correctly
Ensure the pgcrypto extension is installed and configured correctly
Review the list of users with the replication permission.
Ensure PostgreSQL configuration files are outside the data cluster
Ensure PostgreSQL subdirectory locations are outside the data cluster

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure WAL archiving is configured and functional
Ensure SSH as a transport medium

rpminfo_object.comment: Ensure package name matching '^(?i)pgbackrest.*$' is installed
rpminfo_object.name: ^(?i)pgbackrest.*$

systemdunitdependency_object.comment: Ensure 'default.target' has a dependency of postgres

sql57_object.sql: select regexp_matches(setting, '\/.*\/') from pg_settings where name = 'data_directory';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure the log destinations are set correctly
Ensure the logging collector is enabled
Ensure the log file destination directory is set correctly
Ensure the filename pattern for log files is set correctly
Ensure the log file permissions are set to '0600'
Ensure the maximum log file lifetime is set correctly
Ensure the maximum log file size is set correctly
Ensure the correct syslog facility is selected
Ensure the program name for PostgreSQL syslog messages is correct
Ensure the correct messages are written to the server log
Ensure the correct SQL statements generating errors are recorded
Ensure the PostgreSQL Audit Extension (pgAudit) is enabled
Ensure excessive function privileges are revoked
sql57_object.sql: SELECT nspname, proname, proargtypes, prosecdef, rolname, proconfig FROM pg_proc p JOIN pg_namespace n ON p.pronamespace = n.oid JOIN pg_authid a ON a.oid = p.proowner WHERE prosecdef OR NOT proconfig IS NULL;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure the `pg_permissions` extension is available for use.
Ensure the extension 'set_user' is available for use.
Review the list of all database roles that have `superuser` access.
sql57_object.sql: select rolname from pg_roles where rolsuper is true;
select setting from pg_settings where name = 'ignore_system_indexes' AND context IN ('backend','superuser-backend') order by 1;
select setting from pg_settings where name = 'log_connections' AND context IN ('backend','superuser-backend') order by 1;
select setting from pg_settings where name = 'log_disconnections' AND context IN ('backend','superuser-backend') order by 1;
select setting from pg_settings where name = 'post_auth_delay' AND context IN ('backend','superuser-backend') order by 1;
select name, setting from pg_settings where context = 'postmaster' order by 1;
select name, setting from pg_settings where context = 'sighup' order by 1;
select name, setting from pg_settings where context = 'superuser' order by 1;
select name, setting from pg_settings where context = 'user' order by 1;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure SSL is enabled and configured correctly
Ensure the pgcrypto extension is installed and configured correctly
Review the list of users with the replication permission.
sql57_object.sql: select rolname from pg_roles where rolreplication is true;
select rolname from pg_roles where rolreplication is true;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure PostgreSQL configuration files are outside the data cluster
sql57_object.sql: SELECT name, setting FROM pg_settings WHERE name IN ('hba_file','ident_file','ssl_cert_file','ssl_key_file','ssl_ca_file','ssl_crl_file','krb_server_keyfile');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure PostgreSQL subdirectory locations are outside the data cluster
sql57_object.sql: SELECT name, setting FROM pg_settings WHERE name IN ('data_directory','log_directory' ,'default_tablespace' ,'temp_tablespaces');

select name, setting from pg_settings where name in ('external_pid_file', 'unix_socket_directories','shared_preload_libraries','dynamic_library_path','local_preload_libraries','session_preload_libraries');

textfilecontent54_object.comment: Ensure WAL archiving is configured and functional
Ensure SSH as a transport medium

systemdunitdependency_state.comment: Ensure 'default.target' has a dependency of postgres

sql57_state.comment: Ensure the log destinations are set correctly
Ensure the logging collector is enabled
Ensure the log file destination directory is set correctly
Ensure the filename pattern for log files is set correctly
Ensure the log file permissions are set to '0600'
Ensure the maximum log file lifetime is set correctly
Ensure the maximum log file size is set correctly
Ensure the correct syslog facility is selected
Ensure the program name for PostgreSQL syslog messages is correct
Ensure the correct messages are written to the server log
Ensure the correct SQL statements generating errors are recorded
Ensure the PostgreSQL Audit Extension (pgAudit) is enabled
Ensure excessive function privileges are revoked
Ensure SSL is enabled and configured correctly

Ensure SSH as a transport medium

local_variable.comment: Capture the directory path for the PostgreSQL config file.
Capture the directory path for the PostgreSQL config file, typically postgresql.conf
This value is used in Rule: Ensure Data Cluster Initialized Successfully

external_variable.comment: Ensure the log destinations are set correctly
Ensure the logging collector is enabled
Ensure the log file destination directory is set correctly
Ensure the filename pattern for log files is set correctly
Ensure the log file permissions are set to '0600'
Ensure the maximum log file lifetime is set correctly
Ensure the maximum log file size is set correctly
Ensure the correct syslog facility is selected
Ensure the program name for PostgreSQL syslog messages is correct
Ensure the correct messages are written to the server log
Ensure the correct SQL statements generating errors are recorded
Ensure the PostgreSQL Audit Extension (pgAudit) is enabled
Ensure excessive function privileges are revoked
Ensure SSL is enabled and configured correctly
Ensure WAL archiving is configured and functional
Ensure SSH as a transport medium
